name: HKQuantityType
desc: A type that identifies samples that store numerical values.

items.name: init(HKQuantityTypeIdentifier)
items.desc: Creates a quantity type using the provided identifier.

items.name: var aggregationStyle: HKQuantityAggregationStyle
items.desc: The aggregation style for the given quantity type.

items.name: enum HKQuantityAggregationStyle
items.desc: Constant values that describe how quantities can be aggregated over time.

items.name: func `is`(compatibleWith: HKUnit) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the quantity type is compatible with the given unit.
